content: this is a cute crochet pattern for a coaster in the shape of a paw this pattern is demonstrated in a video the audio is in japanese accompanied by clear english subtitles there is also a link to a chart in the video description you will need two colours of a worsted weight yarn the brand in the video is called lambs wool maison yarn and one skein is approx 50g it is 100% wool you will not use the whole roll you will need a 3 5 mm crochet hook
